name: v1.2.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "176e601d21d1151efd88b6b027a24e782493c5d623d8c6211c7767f306d655c8",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-1.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v1.2.0/rules_oci-v1.2.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* feat: #180 make the tarball target runnable by @ewhauser in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/290
* Add example for how to create a static content server image with nginx. by @echochamber in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/255
* Make sure that the `tars` list contains unique records by @uhlajs in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/256
* Add support for HTTP Basic auth by @joca-bt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/268
* Allow to supply env to oci_image as a file (e.g. stamped). by @sfc-gh-ptabor in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/264
* Fix failing //oci/tests:test_chainguard_static test on ARM. by @sfc-gh-ptabor in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/263
* Replace shasum with sha256sum by @aaliddell in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/277
* Update Crane version by @uhlajs in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/281
* Replace --fail-with-body for a test that checks the status code by @jamiees2 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/276
* Fix: Error: key "type" not found in dictionary by @prestonvanloon in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/291
* Remove '"' from path in MANIFEST_DIGEST when creating a tar file by @rbielak in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/278
* fix: Avoid mkdir -p attempting to change permissions by @anguslees in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/271
* Fix typo in oci_push docs by @Sovietaced in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/274
* fix(docs): indicate that oci_tarball#repo_tags is mandatory by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/293

## New Contributors
* @echochamber made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/255
* @uhlajs made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/256
* @joca-bt made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/268
* @sfc-gh-ptabor made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/264
* @aaliddell made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/277
* @jamiees2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/276
* @prestonvanloon made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/291
* @rbielak made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/278
* @anguslees made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/271
* @Sovietaced made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/274
* @ewhauser made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/290

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v1.0.0...v1.2.0

name: v1.1.0
body:
ðŸ™ˆ 
This release was tagged one commit sooner than intended, so we recommend you jump to v1.2.0 instead.


WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "63d12d31a59cfe7e93d42b2b86f3d737e73c3b6ce79a205192e0c4c5e8a3cf6d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-1.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v1.1.0/rules_oci-v1.1.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

name: v1.0.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "db57efd706f01eb3ce771468366baa1614b5b25f4cce99757e2b8d942155b8ec",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-1.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v1.0.0/rules_oci-v1.0.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: remove registry flag now that container-structure-test is on BCR by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/223
* refactor: rename oci_push#repotags to default_tags by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/222
* chore: rename repotags to repo_tags by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/224
* refactor: replace print statements with warning by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/226
* fix: single image with tag is handled incorrectly by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/231
* add latest cosign releases by @bobcallaway in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/232
* chore: remove bzlmod workaround by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/227
* fix: implement per registry credential helpers by @tstromberg in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/237
* test: add test for per registry credential helpers by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/242
* docs: add load site by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/243
* Add auth support for cgr.dev (Chainguard Images) by @tstromberg in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/246
* feat: show a .tar.xz image layer from debian by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/250

## New Contributors
* @bobcallaway made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/232
* @tstromberg made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/237

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.6.2...v1.0.0

name: v1.0.0-rc0
body:
ðŸ“° This release is the first to offer a semver-stability guarantee, since we've graduated from a 0.x version.

There will be bug-fixes leading up to the final 1.0.0 release, but no breaking changes or new features.

WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "08d73a9bec22642ee12c0a38c23596cbddaba7422eede74edba3bb1044d579be",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-1.0.0-rc0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v1.0.0-rc0/rules_oci-v1.0.0-rc0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: remove registry flag now that container-structure-test is on BCR by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/223
* refactor: rename oci_push#repotags to remote_tags by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/222
* chore: rename repotags to repo_tags by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/224


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.6.2...v1.0.0-rc0

## What's Changed
* fix: CI shouldn't skip the root folder for bzlmod by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/219


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2

name: v0.6.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "8aa36ae6c8067ff5a837ecb05aeb6396e5a469194b14bf98ff2ddf956ae817ec",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v0.6.0/rules_oci-v0.6.0.tar.gz",
)

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)
```


## What's Changed
* fix: downgrade rules_pkg to 0.7.0 by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/195
* ci: disable macos ci by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/194
* docs: be more clear that you load a tarball target by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/197
* fix: remove duplicate debian target by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/192
* ci: remove upterm action by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/201
* fix: pinning is broken by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/200
* chore: remove structure test by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/182
* docs: add build instruction for rust by @vucong2409 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/173
* fix: take variant into account by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/174
* chore: re-use release automation workflow by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/204
* chore: test on Bazel 6 and Bazel 5 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/203
* fix: disallow os, arch and variant to be specified with base by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/172
* Fix bug with formatting of repotags in tarball manifest.json [re-do] by @AttilaTheFun in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/205
* refactor: make pinning a warning by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/206
* fix: extract image digest raw from yq by @steeve in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/208
* Revert "fix: extract image digest raw from yq" by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/210
* Revert "refactor: merge repository into repotags (#169)" by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/213
* test: add missing test case for oci_tarball#repotags by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/209
* fix: port number should be allowed in push by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/215
* refactor: drop rules_pkg dependency by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/207
* test: assert oci_* rules are reproducible by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/214

## New Contributors
* @vucong2409 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/173
* @AttilaTheFun made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/205
* @steeve made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/208

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "1c4730c85b90e793679ec534d47878bc19ecc267e43b21cf050081c7fe025af7",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v0.5.0/rules_oci-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)

# Optional, for oci_tarball rule
load("@rules_pkg//:deps.bzl", "rules_pkg_dependencies")

rules_pkg_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* refactor: 1.0 design review cleanups by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/187
* feat: Allow stampable repotags for oci_tarball by @josephglanville in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/185

## New Contributors
* @josephglanville made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/185

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "d7b0760ba28554b71941ea0bbfd0a9f089bf250fd4448f9c116e1cb7a63b3933",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v0.4.0/rules_oci-v0.4.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)

# Optional, for oci_tarball rule
load("@rules_pkg//:deps.bzl", "rules_pkg_dependencies")

rules_pkg_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* docs(oci_pull): Add note about syntax sugar by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/142
* fix: DOCKER_CONFIG is a dir not file by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/147
* fix: replace crane fallback with curl by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/143
* fix: print an actionable warning when INVALID_MANIFEST encountered by @LavaToaster in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/144
* fix: prevent spamming on missing config file by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/145
* fix: auth_config_locator incorrectly reports presence by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/150
* feat: support credStore by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/131
* feat: allow stamping labels/annotations by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/155
* refactor: rename structure_test#config -> configs by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/157
* docs: add placeholders for more languages by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/158
* support pulling from ghcr.io by @LavaToaster in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/153
* Update README.md by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/159
* fix: transition a test to explicit arch by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/161
* refactor: oci_pull's in separate macro by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/162
* fix: remove unused toolchain_name attribute by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/164
* syntax sugar for oci_pull by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/163
* fix: fallback to curl on manifest fetch error by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/166
* test(oci_pull): add unit tests for parsing image string by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/167
* fix: remove genrule fetching base image by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/165
* refactor: merge repository into repotags by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/169
* ci: retry auth tests by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/175

## New Contributors
* @LavaToaster made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/144

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.3.9...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.9
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "f6125c9a123a2ac58fb6b13b4b8d4631827db9cfac025f434bbbefbd97953f7c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_oci-0.3.9",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/releases/download/v0.3.9/rules_oci-v0.3.9.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # Uncommenting the zot toolchain will cause it to be used instead of crane for some tasks.
    # Note that it does not support docker-format images.
    # zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)

# Optional, for oci_tarball rule
load("@rules_pkg//:deps.bzl", "rules_pkg_dependencies")

rules_pkg_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: no windows test yet by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/120
* chore: bump rules_pkg to 0.9.0 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/128
* Update WORKSPACE.bazel by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/130
* fix: pulling from public ecr by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/136
* Support OCI media types on pull in addition to docker media types by @bcmyers in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/137
* feat: allow specifying protocol by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/133


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.3.8...v0.3.9

name: v0.3.8
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_oci",
    sha256 = "4a738bdbeacb0e1df070209dddfa7b55fed9bbc553b905cf3d2dd25115e0b598",

)

load("@rules_oci//oci:dependencies.bzl", "rules_oci_dependencies")

rules_oci_dependencies()

load("@rules_oci//oci:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_CRANE_VERSION", "LATEST_ZOT_VERSION", "oci_register_toolchains")

oci_register_toolchains(
    name = "oci",
    crane_version = LATEST_CRANE_VERSION,
    # If a docker media types compatible registry is desired, just omit `zot_version` and crane registry will be used instead.
    zot_version = LATEST_ZOT_VERSION,
)

# Optional, for oci_tarball rule
load("@rules_pkg//:deps.bzl", "rules_pkg_dependencies")

rules_pkg_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* refactor: rename x86_64 to amd64 by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/114

* chore(bzlmod): add trivial pass-through module extension for oci_pull by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/118

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.3.7...v0.3.8

## What's Changed
* fix: url to download bazel-skylib by @tetsuok in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/64
* release: publish release artifact by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/62
* chore: rename example to examples by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/66
* oci_pull repo rule: fetch base layers with bazel downloader by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/67
* fix hard-coded mediaType by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/75
* Add labels to oci_image by @psalaberria002 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/76
* chore: add an example for custom registry by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/71
* feat: demonstrate a replacement for go_image by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/77
* chore: add structure_test for custom registry example by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/78

## New Contributors
* @psalaberria002 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/76

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3.0

## What's Changed
* Update README.md by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/44
* chore(docs): fix bad html tag appearing in markdown by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/43
* feat: implement cosign_attach by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/45
* Fix typo in example of `oci_image` by @tetsuok in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/50
* Cache results per OS by @tetsuok in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/51
* feat: allow .tar.gz files as layers by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/56
* refactor: cleanup toolchains by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/57


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

## What's Changed
* chore: rename container -> oci by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/12
* refactor: convert oci_toolchain to crane_toolchain by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/25
* Fix paths to caches for Bazel in CI by @tetsuok in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/27
* feat: add zot as the registry by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/26
* feat: implement oci_tarball by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/30
* feat: implement structure_test by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/31
* feat: implement oci_image by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/33
* feat: implement oci_image_index by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/34
* feat: implement oci_cosign by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/36
* feat: implement oci_push by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/38

## New Contributors
* @tetsuok made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/pull/27

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_oci/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

## What's Changed
* Mirror release info into versions file by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/1
* chore: clean docs and fix release mirror script by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/2
* wip: collect runfiles by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/3
* build: fix ci build caching by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/5
* fix: move cache flags out of ci bazelrc by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/6
* build: move ci cache flags to bazelrc by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/7
* chore: update to latest changes from template by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/8

## New Contributors
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/1
* @thesayyn made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/2
* @kormide made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/pull/5

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_container/commits/v0.1.0
